title: Give a title to the GDer above you based on their name
body:
http://fc06.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2011/030/a/5/league_of_legends___yordles_by_human_failure-d38euet.jpg
*Plz use quotes plz, posting directly can be confusing mehehehe*

**You can also give a title based on the Icon/Fek avatar there using **

Exemplary titles like:

Veigar follower
Annoying Minion
Brainwashed
Voidling 
Critling 
Food for Weebs
Seraph Lord
Salt lake city

All have fun and may you all be blessed by EVIL!!! and maybe light....
